FuncDef:
The dual-active detection hold-time command sets the DAD delay during M-LAG heartbeat recovery.
The undo dual-active detection hold-time command restores the default DAD delay during M-LAG heartbeat recovery. The dual-active detection hold-time command sets the DAD delay during M-LAG heartbeat recovery. The undo dual-active detection hold-time command restores the default DAD delay during M-LAG heartbeat recovery. By default, the DAD delay upon M-LAG heartbeat recovery is 3 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
DAD delay during M-LAG heartbeat recovery.
The value is an integer ranging from 100 to 10000, in milliseconds. The default value is 3000 ms.
